title: Gauntlets of fumbling/zh-CN

**[English](/wiki/Gauntlets_of_fumbling "Gauntlets of fumbling")** • [中文（中国大陆）‎]()

| \[ [![Leather gloves.png](/images/9/95/Leather_gloves.png)](/wiki/File:Leather_gloves.png)   \[ [![Padded gloves.png](/images/4/47/Padded_gloves.png)](/wiki/File:Padded_gloves.png)   \[ [![Riding gloves.png](/images/e/ed/Riding_gloves.png)](/wiki/File:Riding_gloves.png)   \[ [![Fencing gloves.png](/images/c/ce/Fencing_gloves.png)](/wiki/File:Fencing_gloves.png)***笨拙手套 |                                                                                                                  |
| ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| 外观                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 | [随机](/index.php?title=%E9%9A%8F%E6%9C%BA%E5%A4%96%E8%A7%82\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "随机外观 (page does not exist)") |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                                                                                                                  |
| 装备槽位                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               | [手套](/wiki/%E6%89%8B%E5%A5%97 "手套")                                                                              |
| AC                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 | [1](/index.php?title=%E6%8A%A4%E7%94%B2%E7%AD%89%E7%BA%A7\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "护甲等级 (page does not exist)")  |
| 特殊效果                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               | - [笨拙](/index.php?title=%E7%AC%A8%E6%8B%99\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "笨拙 (page does not exist)")                   |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                                                                                                                  |
| 基础价                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                | 50 [zm](/wiki/%E9%87%91%E5%B8%81 "金币")                                                                           |
| 重量                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 | [10](/index.php?title=%E9%87%8D%E9%87%8F\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "重量 (page does not exist)")                     |
| 材料                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 | [皮革](/index.php?title=%E7%9A%AE%E9%9D%A9\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "皮革 (page does not exist)")                     |

**笨拙手套**（gauntlets of fumbling）是[NetHack](/index.php?title=NetHack/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "NetHack/zh-CN (page does not exist)")中的一种[手套](/wiki/%E6%89%8B%E5%A5%97 "手套")类[防具](/wiki/%E9%98%B2%E5%85%B7 "防具")。它由[皮革](/index.php?title=%E7%9A%AE%E9%9D%A9\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "皮革 (page does not exist)")制成，属于[魔法](/index.php?title=%E9%AD%94%E6%B3%95%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "魔法物品 (page does not exist)")防具，未[鉴定](/index.php?title=%E9%89%B4%E5%AE%9A\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "鉴定 (page does not exist)")时外观是[随机](/index.php?title=%E9%9A%8F%E6%9C%BA%E5%A4%96%E8%A7%82\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "随机外观 (page does not exist)")的[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)。

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 生成](#.E7.94.9F.E6.88.90)

- [2 描述](#.E6.8F.8F.E8.BF.B0)

- [3 策略](#.E7.AD.96.E7.95.A5)

- [4 历史](#.E5.8E.86.E5.8F.B2)

- [5 Variants](#Variants)

  - [5.1 SLASH'EM](#SLASH.27EM)
  - [5.2 GruntHack](#GruntHack)
  - [5.3 dNetHack](#dNetHack)
  - [5.4 Hack'EM](#Hack.27EM)

- [6 引用及注释](#.E5.BC.95.E7.94.A8.E5.8F.8A.E6.B3.A8.E9.87.8A)

## 生成

笨拙手套生成时有90.45%的概率是被[诅咒](/index.php?title=%E8%AF%85%E5%92%92\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "诅咒 (page does not exist)")的[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)。

在[星界位面](/index.php?title=%E6%98%9F%E7%95%8C%E4%BD%8D%E9%9D%A2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "星界位面 (page does not exist)")生成的[玩家怪物](/index.php?title=%E7%8E%A9%E5%AE%B6%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "玩家怪物 (page does not exist)")在生成时若未携带[战锤](/wiki/%E6%88%98%E9%94%A4 "战锤")，则有7⁄8的概率[获得](/index.php?title=%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E8%B5%B7%E5%A7%8B%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "怪物起始物品 (page does not exist)")一双随机手套，该双手套有1⁄5的概率是笨拙手套，因此玩家怪物生成时获得笨拙手套的概率是7⁄40（约17.5%）[\[3\]](#cite_note-3)。

## 描述

笨拙手套的基础[AC](/index.php?title=AC/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "AC/zh-CN (page does not exist)")加成为1，穿戴时会赋予玩家[笨拙](/index.php?title=%E7%AC%A8%E6%8B%99\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "笨拙 (page does not exist)")特质，该特质会使得玩家在进行特定行动时受到限制，且在经过有放置物品的地块时有可能被绊倒并制造噪音。穿戴笨拙手套还会导致玩家使用[弓](/wiki/%E5%BC%93 "弓")射击时受到-3[命中](/index.php?title=%E5%91%BD%E4%B8%AD\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "命中 (page does not exist)")的惩罚[\[4\]](#cite_note-4)。

## 策略

为避免穿上诅咒的笨拙手套，玩家不应随意试穿未确定[BUC](/index.php?title=BUC/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "BUC/zh-CN (page does not exist)")的手套。

穿戴笨拙手套属于[小麻烦](/index.php?title=%E5%B0%8F%E9%BA%BB%E7%83%A6\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "小麻烦 (page does not exist)")[\[5\]](#cite_note-5)[\[6\]](#cite_note-6)，因此你可以通过[祈祷](/index.php?title=%E7%A5%88%E7%A5%B7\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "祈祷 (page does not exist)")来解除手套的诅咒以便脱下它。

## 历史

笨拙手套最初于[NetHack 3.0.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.0.0 "NetHack 3.0.0")加入游戏。

## Variants

**此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。**  
您可以帮助我们[**翻译此页面**](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Gauntlets_of_fumbling/zh-CN\&action=edit)，但**请勿使用机器翻译**。

### SLASH'EM

In [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"), a cursed -4 pair of gauntlets of fumbling is generated within the Chamber of Junk in the [Lawful Quest](/wiki/Lawful_Quest "Lawful Quest") at level creation. This also applies to [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM").

### GruntHack

In [GruntHack](/wiki/GruntHack "GruntHack"), gauntlets of fumbling set a character's [dexterity](/wiki/Dexterity "Dexterity") to 6, as low dexterity in general is changed to also cause intermittent fumbling.

### dNetHack

In [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack"), [notdNetHack](/wiki/NotdNetHack "NotdNetHack") and [notnotdNetHack](/wiki/NotnotdNetHack "NotnotdNetHack"), gauntlets of fumbling grant 0 base AC, 1 base [DR](/wiki/DR "DR") and fumbling while worn.

### Hack'EM

In [Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM"), in addition to SLASH'EM details, [upgrading](/wiki/Upgrading "Upgrading") gauntlets of fumbling can create [gauntlets of dexterity](/wiki/Gauntlets_of_dexterity "Gauntlets of dexterity"), and vice versa.

## 引用及注释

1. [↑](#cite_ref-1) [src/objects.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 499](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/objects.c#L499)
2. [↑](#cite_ref-2) [src/mkobj.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 997](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/mkobj.c#L997)
3. [↑](#cite_ref-3) [src/mplayer.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 289](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/mplayer.c#L289)
4. [↑](#cite_ref-4) [src/dothrow.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 1574](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/dothrow.c#L1574)
5. [↑](#cite_ref-5) [src/pray.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 235](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/pray.c#L235)
6. [↑](#cite_ref-6) [src/pray.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 479](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/pray.c#L479)

[![此条目的内容已同步至NetHack 3.6.7。详细信息请点击此处。](/images/f/f7/Nh367-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "此条目的内容已同步至NetHack 3.6.7。详细信息请点击此处。")
html:
Gauntlets of fumbling/zh-CN

From NetHackWiki
< Gauntlets of fumbling
Jump to navigation Jump to search

NetHack 中文 Wiki 需要您的帮助！
了解如何帮助我们完善Wiki

English

 • 中文（中国大陆）‎
[    [    [    [ 
笨拙手套
外观 随机
装备槽位 手套
AC 1
特殊效果
  • 笨拙
基础价 50 zm
重量 10
材料 皮革

笨拙手套（gauntlets of fumbling）是NetHack中的一种手套类防具。它由皮革制成，属于魔法防具，未鉴定时外观是随机的[1]。

Contents

  • 1 生成
  • 2 描述
  • 3 策略
  • 4 历史
  • 5 Variants
    • 5.1 SLASH'EM
    • 5.2 GruntHack
    • 5.3 dNetHack
    • 5.4 Hack'EM
  • 6 引用及注释

生成

笨拙手套生成时有90.45%的概率是被诅咒的[2]。

在星界位面生成的玩家怪物在生成时若未携带战锤，则有7⁄8的概率获得一双随机手套，该双手套有1⁄5的概率是笨拙手套，因此玩家怪物生成时获得笨拙手套的概率是7⁄40（约17.5%）[3]。

描述

笨拙手套的基础AC加成为1，穿戴时会赋予玩家笨拙特质，该特质会使得玩家在进行特定行动时受到限制，且在经过有放置物品的地块时有可能被绊倒并制造噪音。穿戴笨拙手套还会导致玩家使用弓射击时受到-3命中的惩罚[4]。

策略

为避免穿上诅咒的笨拙手套，玩家不应随意试穿未确定BUC的手套。

穿戴笨拙手套属于小麻烦[5][6]，因此你可以通过祈祷来解除手套的诅咒以便脱下它。

历史

笨拙手套最初于NetHack 3.0.0加入游戏。

Variants

此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。
您可以帮助我们翻译此页面，但请勿使用机器翻译。

SLASH'EM

In SLASH'EM, a cursed -4 pair of gauntlets of fumbling is generated within the Chamber of Junk in the Lawful Quest at level creation. This also applies to SlashTHEM.

GruntHack

In GruntHack, gauntlets of fumbling set a character's dexterity to 6, as low dexterity in general is changed to also cause intermittent fumbling.

dNetHack

In dNetHack, notdNetHack and notnotdNetHack, gauntlets of fumbling grant 0 base AC, 1 base DR and fumbling while worn.

Hack'EM

In Hack'EM, in addition to SLASH'EM details, upgrading gauntlets of fumbling can create gauntlets of dexterity, and vice versa.

引用及注释

  1. ↑ src/objects.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 499
  2. ↑ src/mkobj.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 997
  3. ↑ src/mplayer.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 289
  4. ↑ src/dothrow.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 1574
  5. ↑ src/pray.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 235
  6. ↑ src/pray.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 479

  • [[笨拙]]
|cost=50 |weight=10 |material=皮革 }} '''笨拙手套'''（gauntlets of fumbling）是{{cnlink|NetHack}}中的一种[[手套]]类[[防具]]。它由[[皮革]]制成，属于[[魔法物品|魔法]]防具，未[[鉴定]]时外观是[[随机外观|随机]]的{{refsrc|src/objects.c|499|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。 == 生成 == 笨拙手套生成时有90.45%的概率是被[[诅咒]]的{{refsrc|src/mkobj.c|997|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。 在[[星界位面]]生成的[[玩家怪物]]在生成时若未携带[[战锤]]，则有{{frac|7|8}}的概率[[怪物起始物品|获得]]一双随机手套，该双手套有{{frac|5}}的概率是笨拙手套，因此玩家怪物生成时获得笨拙手套的概率是{{frac|7|40}}（约17.5%）{{refsrc|src/mplayer.c|289|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。 == 描述 == 笨拙手套的基础{{cnlink|AC}}加成为1，穿戴时会赋予玩家[[笨拙]]特质，该特质会使得玩家在进行特定行动时受到限制，且在经过有放置物品的地块时有可能被绊倒并制造噪音。穿戴笨拙手套还会导致玩家使用[[弓]]射击时受到-3[[命中]]的惩罚{{refsrc|src/dothrow.c|1574|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。 == 策略 == 为避免穿上诅咒的笨拙手套，玩家不应随意试穿未确定{{cnlink|BUC}}的手套。 穿戴笨拙手套属于[[小麻烦]]{{refsrc|src/pray.c|235|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}{{refsrc|src/pray.c|479|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}，因此你可以通过[[祈祷]]来解除手套的诅咒以便脱下它。 == 历史 == 笨拙手套最初于[[NetHack 3.0.0]]加入游戏。 ==Variants== {{translation/zh-CN|n}} ===SLASH'EM=== In [[SLASH'EM]], a cursed -4 pair of gauntlets of fumbling is generated within the Chamber of Junk in the [[Lawful Quest]] at level creation. This also applies to [[SlashTHEM]]. ===GruntHack=== In [[GruntHack]], gauntlets of fumbling set a character's [[dexterity]] to 6, as low dexterity in general is changed to also cause intermittent fumbling. ===dNetHack=== In [[dNetHack]], [[notdNetHack]] and [[notnotdNetHack]], gauntlets of fumbling grant 0 base AC, 1 base [[DR]] and fumbling while worn. ===Hack'EM=== In [[Hack'EM]], in addition to SLASH'EM details, [[upgrading]] gauntlets of fumbling can create [[gauntlets of dexterity]], and vice versa. == 引用及注释 == {{nethack-367/zh-CN}} [[Category:Gloves/zh-CN|BENZHUOSHOUTAO]]
